step.datasource: SELECT TOP (1) 0 as doQuit FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.items i with (nolock) LEFT JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.staffl s with (nolock) ON s.prijslijst = 'ICL' AND validfrom < GETDATE() AND ISNULL(validto, '2099-12-31') > GETDATE() AND s.artcode = i.itemcode WHERE ( i.condition = 'A' or i.condition = 'F' ) AND i.IsSalesItem = 1 AND i.SalesPackagePrice > 0 AND i.CostPriceStandard > 0 AND ( s.ID IS NULL OR s.bedr1 <> i.CostPriceStandard OR s.prijs83 <> i.SalesPackagePrice )

INSERT INTO [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._ST_ICLPriceUpdate SELECT top 50 ltrim(rtrim(i.itemcode)) AS 'ItemCode', 'ICL' as 'PriceListCode', 'S' as 'PriceListType', 'ICL' as 'PriceListDescription', 'EUR' as 'CurrencyCode', 'C' as 'AccountType', 'A' as 'AccountStatus', cast(i.SalesPackagePrice as numeric(18,3)) as 'Value', CASE WHEN s.unitcode IS NULL THEN 'pcs' else s.unitcode END as 'Unit', 1 as 'Factor', 1 as 'LineType', CONVERT(DATE, CASE WHEN s.validfrom IS NULL THEN i.syscreated else s.validfrom END) as 'DateStart', CONVERT(DATE, CASE WHEN s.validfrom IS NULL THEN '2099-12-31' else s.validto END) as 'DateEnd', 'N' as 'DiscountType', 1 as 'DiscountNumber', 1 as 'DiscountQuantity', cast(i.costpricestandard as numeric(18,3)) as 'DiscountValue', CASE WHEN ( s.ID IS NULL ) THEN 'NewItem' WHEN ( s.bedr1 <> i.CostPriceStandard ) THEN 'UpdateCostPrice' WHEN ( s.prijs83 <> i.SalesPackagePrice ) THEN 'UpdateSalesPrice' ELSE 'Other' END AS UpdateReason, GETDATE() AS CreationDate, '%abeisourcedb%' AS SourceDB, '%runid%' AS RunId FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.items i with (nolock) LEFT JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.staffl s with (nolock) ON s.prijslijst = 'ICL' AND validfrom < GETDATE() AND ISNULL(validto, '2099-12-31') > GETDATE() AND s.artcode = i.itemcode WHERE ( i.condition = 'A' or i.condition = 'F' ) AND i.IsSalesItem = 1 AND i.SalesPackagePrice > 0 AND i.CostPriceStandard > 0 AND ( s.ID IS NULL OR s.bedr1 <> i.CostPriceStandard OR s.prijs83 <> i.SalesPackagePrice ) ORDER BY itemcode

SELECT '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="iso-8859-1" ?>' + CONVERT(varchar(max), (SELECT
(SELECT top 50 ltrim(rtrim(i.itemcode)) AS 'Item/@code', 'ICL' as 'PriceList/@code', 'S' as 'PriceList/@type', 'ICL' as 'PriceList/Description', 'EUR' as 'PriceList/Currency/@code', 'C' as 'PriceList/AccountType', 'A' as 'PriceList/AccountStatus', cast(i.SalesPackagePrice as numeric(18,3)) as 'Value', CASE WHEN s.unitcode IS NULL THEN 'pcs' else s.unitcode END as 'Unit/@unit', 1 as 'Factor', 1 as 'LineType', CONVERT(DATE, CASE WHEN s.validfrom IS NULL THEN i.syscreated else s.validfrom END) as 'Availability/DateStart', CONVERT(DATE, CASE WHEN s.validfrom IS NULL THEN '2099-12-31' else s.validto END) as 'Availability/DateEnd', 'N' as 'Discounts/@type', 1 as 'Discounts/Discount/@number', 1 as 'Discounts/Discount/Quantity', cast(i.costpricestandard as numeric(18,3)) as 'Discounts/Discount/Value'
FROM dbo.items i with (nolock) LEFT JOIN dbo.staffl s with (nolock) ON s.prijslijst = 'ICL' AND validfrom < GETDATE() AND ISNULL(validto, '2099-12-31') > GETDATE() AND s.artcode = i.itemcode WHERE ( i.condition = 'A' or i.condition = 'F' ) AND i.IsSalesItem = 1 AND i.SalesPackagePrice > 0 AND i.CostPriceStandard > 0 AND ( s.ID IS NULL OR s.bedr1 <> i.CostPriceStandard OR s.prijs83 <> i.SalesPackagePrice ) ORDER BY itemcode FOR XML PATH ('ItemPrice'), TYPE) FOR XML PATH ('ItemPrices'),ROOT('eExact'), ELEMENTS XSINIL)) as xmlcontent

DECLARE @path VARCHAR(100) = 'C:/Apps/ICL Pricelist/' DECLARE @file VARCHAR(100) = 'ICLPricelist.xml'
SELECT @path + @file AS oldfilename, @path + 'archive/' + REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), GETDATE(), 120),' ',''),':', ''),'-', ''),'.','') + '_' + @file as newfilename
